entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:53 PM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind light except northeast 40 km/h through mainland inlets and valleys. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023
